Package mono.model.entities

Class Property

  • java.lang.Object
    • mono.model.entities.Square
      • mono.model.entities.BuyableSquare
        • mono.model.entities.Property

  • public class Property
extends BuyableSquare
    Creates property square, calculates rent and builds houses and hotels. Subclass of buyable square
    Author:
    ricar

    • Constructor Detail

      • Property

        public Property​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String color,
                int cost,
                int normalRent,
                int oneRent,
                int twoRent,
                int threeRent,
                int fourRent,
                int hotelRent,
                int buildingCost,
                int position,
                float coordinX,
                float coordinY)
        Creates property square
        Parameters:
        name - property's name
        color - property's color
        cost - property's cost
        normalRent - property's rent without houses
        oneRent - property's rent with one house
        twoRent - property's rent with two houses
        threeRent - property's rent with three houses
        fourRent - property's rent with four houses
        hotelRent - property's rent with a hotel
        buildingCost - cost for each building
        position - property's position in board
        coordinX - x coordinate (used to draw buildings)
        coordinY - y coordinate (used to draw buildings)
